section.title: The Other Four Tickets
section.p: Charlie was the last child to find a golden ticket. Here's how the four other children found their golden tickets:

section.title: Augustus Gloop
section.p: The first child to find a golden ticket was Augustus Gloop.
He is a heavyset child who spends most of his time eating gluttonously.
He is a kid who loves eating candy.
Because he eats so much candy, he was able to find the first golden ticket quickly.

image.alt: A young boy holding a golden ticket with his mom.

section.title: Veruca Salt
section.p: The second child to find a golden ticket was Veruca Salt.
She is an insufferable, spoiled brat. She demands materialistic goods from her father including the golden ticket.
She is a kid who loves toys. She loves toys and gifts from her father.
He enlists his entire factory to spend their time unwrapping chocolate bars until it was found.

image.alt: A young girl holding a golden ticket with her parents.

section.title: Violet Beauregarde
section.p: The third child to find a golden ticket was Violet Beauregarde.
She is a child full of pride and consumed with winning by setting a world record in chewing gum.
She is a kid who competes a lot trying to set a world record in chewing gum.
She takes a short break to find the ticket, then immediately returns to her world record attempt.

image.alt: A young girl smiling holding a golden ticket.

section.title: Mike Teavee
section.p: The fourth child to find a golden ticket is Mike Teavee.
He is a child who is lazy and only cares about watching television.
He is a kid who watches a lot of television.
